Effect: Rune of Flames (Longspear).name: Effect: Rune of Flames (Longspear)
Effect: Rune of Flames (Longspear).description: The longspear deals an additional 3d6 fire damage on all attacks.

Effect: Lantern of Hope.name: Effect: Lantern of Hope
Effect: Lantern of Hope.description: The creature gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls and to saving throws against @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Crushing Despair}.

Effect: Rune of Flames (Rock).name: Effect: Rune of Flames (Rock)
Effect: Rune of Flames (Rock).description: The rock deals an additional 3d6 fire damage on all attacks.

Effect: Fanatical Frenzy.name: Effect: Fanatical Frenzy
Effect: Fanatical Frenzy.description:
Requirements The cultist has taken damage and is neither @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} nor already in a frenzy;

Effect The cultist flies into a frenzy that lasts 1 minute. While frenzied, the cultist gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage rolls, and they take a -2 status penalty to AC. The cultist can't voluntarily stop their frenzy. After their frenzy, the cultist is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

Effect: Commander's Aura.name: Effect: Commander's Aura
Effect: Commander's Aura.description: Commanded or allied evil creatures in the aura of lower level than the @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.ImueS9YFhV6sxqBP]{Marilith} gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, AC, saves, and skill checks.

Effect: Mangling Rend.name: Effect: Mangling Rend
Effect: Mangling Rend.description: The target takes a -20-foot status penalty to all Speeds until the end of its next turn.

Effect: Splintered Ground.name: Effect: Splintered Ground
Effect: Splintered Ground.description:
Granted by the Splintered Ground ability of the @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.myEeYWWAgnkLwtIb]{Skulltaker}

The affected creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds for 10 minutes.

Effect: Defensive Assault (3 Weapons).name: Effect: Defensive Assault (3 Weapons)
Effect: Defensive Assault (3 Weapons).description:
The marilith makes two Strikes, each with a different weapon, and they use the remaining weapons for protection. The demon gains a circumstance bonus to AC for 1 round equal to the number of weapons not used for attacks.

If the marilith later uses any of those weapons to attack (including for an Attack of Opportunity), the bonus to AC decreases by 1 for each weapon used.

Effect: Crystalline Dust Form.name: Effect: Crystalline Dust Form
Effect: Crystalline Dust Form.description: The creature gains a fly Speed of 40 feet.

Effect: Inspirational Presence.name: Effect: Inspirational Presence
Effect: Inspirational Presence.description: Any of the teacher's students in the aura gains a +1 circumstance bonus to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}.

Effect: Timely Advice.name: Effect: Timely Advice
Effect: Timely Advice.description: The sage gives the ally a savvy piece of advice, providing valuable insight. The ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Fire.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Fire
Effect: Breach the Abyss - Fire.description:
Requirements: The demonologist's last action was to cast a non-cantrip spell;

Effect: The demonologist siphons energy drawn from the Abyss into their weapon. Until the end of the turn, the weapon deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6 fire damage}.

The damage type chosen randomly was Fire.

Effect: Bodyguard's Defense.name: Effect: Bodyguard's Defense
Effect: Bodyguard's Defense.description: The bodyguard selects one creature they can see and hear within 30 feet. That creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC as long as the bodyguard is adjacent to the chosen creature and can act; this bonus lasts until the start of the bodyguard's next turn.

Effect: Stoke the Fervent - High Torment.name: Effect: Stoke the Fervent - High Tormentor
Effect: Stoke the Fervent - High Torment.description:
Each ally that hears the call gains a +4 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls, a +2 status bonus to saving throws, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC. Affected allies must use at least one of their actions to Strike each round, if they are able even if it means attacking an ally, object, or thin air).

The effect duration has been set to the average duration for [[/br 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4 rounds}. Set the duration to the correct value when the effect is added.

Effect: Stick a Fork in It.name: Effect: Stick a Fork in It
Effect: Stick a Fork in It.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds.

Effect: Cite Precedent.name: Effect: Cite Precedent
Effect: Cite Precedent.description:
The barrister uses existing case law to undermine their opposition. If they succeed at a Legal Lore check, they impose a -2 circumstance penalty on the next Diplomacy check an opponent attempts in a legal argument.

Any further attempts to Cite Precedent fail until a new topic with different precedents is being argued.

Effect: Aura of Command.name: Effect: Aura of Command
Effect: Aura of Command.description: The captain of the guard bolsters lower-level guards under their command, granting them a +1 status bonus to their attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to their Will saves.

Effect: Filth Wave.name: Effect: Filth Wave
Effect: Filth Wave.description: Each creature in the area must succeed at a reflex save or take a -10-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute.

Effect: Devour Soul.name: Effect: Devour Soul
Effect: Devour Soul.description: If the @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.fkBcMpr3Yxxfvz9v]{Astradaemon} successfully kills a creature with Devour Soul, the astradaemon gains 10 temporary Hit Points and a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 1 minute.

Effect: Defensive Assault (2 Weapons).name: Effect: Defensive Assault (2 Weapons)
Effect: Defensive Assault (2 Weapons).description:
The marilith makes two Strikes, each with a different weapon, and they use the remaining weapons for protection. The demon gains a circumstance bonus to AC for 1 round equal to the number of weapons not used for attacks.

If the marilith later uses any of those weapons to attack (including for an Attack of Opportunity), the bonus to AC decreases by 1 for each weapon used.

Effect: Devour Soul (Victim Level 15 or.name: Effect: Devour Soul (Victim Level 15 or Higher)
Effect: Devour Soul (Victim Level 15 or.description: If the @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.fkBcMpr3Yxxfvz9v]{Astradaemon} successfully kills a creature with Devour Soul, the astradaemon gains 10 temporary Hit Points and a +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 1 day.

Effect: Revert Form.name: Effect: Revert Form
Effect: Revert Form.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.

Effect: Blood Frenzy.name: Effect: Blood Frenzy
Effect: Blood Frenzy.description: The creature gains temporary hit points and other effects based on the specific creature.

Effect: Soul Siphon.name: Effect: Soul Siphon
Effect: Soul Siphon.description: An astradaemon draws power from the souls of the recently slain. If a Small or larger living creature dies within its aura, the astradaemon gains 5 temporary Hit Points and a status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 1 round.

Effect: Infectious Aura.name: Effect: Infectious Aura
Effect: Infectious Aura.description:
The creature takes a -2 status penalty to saves against disease effects.

If a creature within range contracts or progresses a disease, all adjacent creatures are exposed to the same disease, at the same DC.

Effect: No Quarter!.name: Effect: No Quarter!
Effect: No Quarter!.description: The captain orders their shipmates to fight without mercy. All allied creatures of equal or lower level within 20 feet of the ship captain gain a+1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the ship captain's next turn.

Effect: Curse of the Baneful Venom.name: Effect: Curse of the Baneful Venom
Effect: Curse of the Baneful Venom.description: Creatures within 30 feet of the jinxer that are currently afflicted by a poison immediately attempt their next saving throw against the poison with a -2 status penalty, then are temporarily immune to Curse of Baleful Venom for 1 hour.

Effect: Defensive Assault (4 Weapons).name: Effect: Defensive Assault (4 Weapons)
Effect: Defensive Assault (4 Weapons).description:
The marilith makes two Strikes, each with a different weapon, and they use the remaining weapons for protection. The demon gains a circumstance bonus to AC for 1 round equal to the number of weapons not used for attacks.

If the marilith later uses any of those weapons to attack (including for an Attack of Opportunity), the bonus to AC decreases by 1 for each weapon used.

Effect: Rune of Smiting (Greatsword).name: Effect: Rune of Smiting (Greatsword)
Effect: Rune of Smiting (Greatsword).description: When the greatsword hits, the giant can Push the target back 10 feet, or 20 feet on a critical hit.

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Negative.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Negative
Effect: Breach the Abyss - Negative.description:
Requirements: The demonologist's last action was to cast a non-cantrip spell;

Effect: The demonologist siphons energy drawn from the Abyss into their weapon. Until the end of the turn, the weapon deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[negative]]]{2d6 negative damage}.

The damage type chosen randomly was Negative.

Effect: Bosun's Command - Attack Bonus.name: Effect: Bosun's Command - Attack Bonus
Effect: Bosun's Command - Attack Bonus.description: The bosun orders an ally to attack or to get in position. Until the end of the ally's next turn, they a +2 status bonus to attack rolls.

Effect: Rune of Smiting (Longspear).name: Effect: Rune of Smiting (Longspear)
Effect: Rune of Smiting (Longspear).description: When the longspear hits, the giant can Push the target back 10 feet, or 20 feet on a critical hit.

Effect: Rune of Smiting (Rock).name: Effect: Rune of Smiting (Rock)
Effect: Rune of Smiting (Rock).description: When the rock hits, the giant can Push the target back 10 feet, or 20 feet on a critical hit.

Effect: Splintered Ground (Critical Fail.name: Effect: Splintered Ground (Critical Failure)
Effect: Splintered Ground (Critical Fail.description:
Granted by the Splintered Ground ability of the @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.myEeYWWAgnkLwtIb]{Skulltaker}

The affected creature takes a -15-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds for 10 minutes.

Effect: Lantern of Hope (Gestalt).name: Effect: Lantern of Hope (Gestalt)
Effect: Lantern of Hope (Gestalt).description: The creature gains a +3 status bonus to damage rolls and to saving throws against @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Crushing Despair}.

Effect: Void Shroud.name: Effect: Void Shroud
Effect: Void Shroud.description: Living creatures in the emanation take a –2 status penalty to saves against fear and death effects.

Effect: Entangling Slime.name: Effect: Entangling Slime
Effect: Entangling Slime.description: A creature struck by a slurk's slime squirt becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} and takes a -5-foot penalty to Speed for 1 hour or until the slime is removed.

Effect: Call to Action.name: Effect: Call to Action
Effect: Call to Action.description: The guildmaster gives a speech to inspire themself and all guild-member allies within 60 feet, granting them a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls until the start of the guildmaster's next turn.

Effect: Necrotic Field.name: Effect: Necrotic Field
Effect: Necrotic Field.description: Undead within the aura deal an additional [[/r {1d6}[negative]]]{1d6 negative damage} with their natural attacks.

Effect: Defensive Assault (1 Weapon).name: Effect: Defensive Assault (1 Weapon)
Effect: Defensive Assault (1 Weapon).description:
The marilith makes two Strikes, each with a different weapon, and they use the remaining weapons for protection. The demon gains a circumstance bonus to AC for 1 round equal to the number of weapons not used for attacks.

If the marilith later uses any of those weapons to attack (including for an Attack of Opportunity), the bonus to AC decreases by 1 for each weapon used.

Effect: Rune of Destruction (Greatsword).name: Effect: Rune of Destruction (Greatsword)
Effect: Rune of Destruction (Greatsword).description: The greatsword gains the deadly trait with 3d12, and a creature hit with the greatsword is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save.

Effect: Take Them Down!.name: Effect: Take Them Down!
Effect: Take Them Down!.description: The duergar taskmaster smashes their maul into the ground and invokes Droskar's name to rally their allies to action. All allied duergars of equal or lower level that are within 20 feet of the duergar taskmaster gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the duergar taskmaster's next turn.

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Acid.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Acid
Effect: Breach the Abyss - Acid.description:
Requirements: The demonologist's last action was to cast a non-cantrip spell;

Effect: The demonologist siphons energy drawn from the Abyss into their weapon. Until the end of the turn, the weapon deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[acid]]]{2d6 acid damage}.

The damage type chosen randomly was Acid.

Effect: Call to Blood.name: Effect: Call to Blood
Effect: Call to Blood.description: The creature gains a +2 status bonus to attack rolls against @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} creatures.

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Cold.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Cold
Effect: Breach the Abyss - Cold.description:
Requirements: The demonologist's last action was to cast a non-cantrip spell;

Effect: The demonologist siphons energy drawn from the Abyss into their weapon. Until the end of the turn, the weapon deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[cold]]]{2d6 cold damage}.

The damage type chosen randomly was Cold.

Effect: Rune of Destruction (Longspear).name: Effect: Rune of Destruction (Longspear)
Effect: Rune of Destruction (Longspear).description: The longspear gains the deadly trait with 3d8, and a creature hit with the longspear is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save.

Effect: Breach the Abyss - Electricity.name: Effect: Breach the Abyss - Electricity
Effect: Breach the Abyss - Electricity.description:
Requirements: The demonologist's last action was to cast a non-cantrip spell;

Effect: The demonologist siphons energy drawn from the Abyss into their weapon. Until the end of the turn, the weapon deals an extra [[/r {2d6}[electricity]]]{2d6 electricity damage}.

The damage type chosen randomly was Electricity.

Effect: Rune of Destruction (Rock).name: Effect: Rune of Destruction (Rock)
Effect: Rune of Destruction (Rock).description: The rock gains the deadly trait with 3d12, and a creature hit with the rock is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save.

Effect: Ghast Stench.name: Effect: Ghast Stench
Effect: Ghast Stench.description: While within the aura, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease and to recover from the sickened condition.

Effect: Bosun's Command - Speed Bonus.name: Effect: Bosun's Command - Speed Bonus
Effect: Bosun's Command - Speed Bonus.description: The bosun orders an ally to attack or to get in position. Until the end of the ally's next turn, they a +10 status bonus to their Speeds.

Effect: Rune of Flames (Greatsword).name: Effect: Rune of Flames (Greatsword)
Effect: Rune of Flames (Greatsword).description: The greatsword deals an additional 3d6 fire damage on all attacks.
